price: No pretendo de ellos ningún sustento ni quiero que Me alimenten,
arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: mā urīdu min'hum min riz'qin wamā urīdu an yuṭ'ʿimūni
